ygData.subject: RE: Sunken Ship
ygData.msgSnippet: Careful of the killer sharks out there tho.  I had to do a corpse recovery out in that ocean last night and those sharks can be a little tough. Darkadvent - CT
ygData.messageBody:
Careful of the killer sharks out there tho. I had to do a corpse recovery
out in that ocean last night and those sharks can be a little tough.

Darkadvent - CT

-----Original Message-----
From: Madgrizzle [mailto:madgrizzle@...]
Sent: Friday, January 28, 2000 6:31 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Sunken Ship


From: Madgrizzle <madgrizzle@...>

I was reading through a post on another mailing list and saw this that
sparked my interest...

>>Go to eruds island (The one with the wisps) and go to the sunken
>>ship on the island. By the ship (underwater) 3 zombies spawn.

Might be a lead on the gemcutter's purpose.
